FuncDef:
The hips enable command enables the host-based intrusion prevention system (HIPS).
The undo hips enable command disables HIPS. The hips enable command enables the host-based intrusion prevention system (HIPS). The undo hips enable command disables HIPS. By default, HIPS is enabled.
ExtraInfo: After HIPS is enabled, the policy file determines whether each detection module is enabled.
